thread.title: Micromax Spark VDEO with 4.5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,499
thread.title_full: Micromax Spark VDEO with 4.5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,499

title: Micromax Spark VDEO with 4.5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,499
text:
Micromax Spark VDEO with 4.5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,499 Micromax Spark VDEO with 4.5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 4,499 By March 23, 2017 “The Spark VDEO is an entry-level offering with support for 12 regional languages” 
Micromax has added yet another budget smartphone to its portfolio called the Spark VDEO. The entry-level offering comes pre-loaded with Google’s Duo video-calling app. The Android Marshmallow-powered device lets you text in 12 regional languages including Malayalam, Telugu, Tamil, Odia, Assamese, Punjabi, Kannada, Gujarati, Hindi, Urdu, Bengali and Marathi. 
The Spark VDEO features a 4.5-inch IPS display bearing a resolution of 854 x 480 pixels. The phone is powered by a 1.1GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon (unspecified chipset), mated to 1GB of RAM. The storage capacity on board is 8GB, which can be further increased up to 32GB by inserting a microSD card. 
The Spark VDEO comes with a 5-megapixel primary shooter with an LED flash and a 2-megapixel secondary snapper. In terms of connectivity, it offers 4G LTE, VoLTE (voice over LTE), dual-SIM slots, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0 and GPS. A 1,800mAh battery completes the list of the specifications. 
The Micromax Canvas Spark VDEO has been priced at Rs 4,499, and will be available exclusively on Snapdeal starting from March 24th in a single gold hue. Facebook Comments
